pages.text: Legendary traits are unlocked only when player unlocks rank 5 traits. Legendary traits are special abilities that could be annoying to fight, very threatening for endgame players, or requires specific mechanics to kill.$(br2)If you think they are too strong, you can disable them through config or datapack.

Here are some examples of legendary traits that requires specific mechanics to kill:$(li)Cursed effect is required to kill mobs with Undying trait. Otherwise they will respawn indefinitely.$(li)Magic damage is required to kill mobs with Teleport Trait or Dementor Trait.
